questions.title: 1 - Monitor the health of the analytics pipelines

choices.title: Best Practice 1.1 - Validate the data quality of source systems before moving to analytics (Required)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.1.1 - Implement data validation mechanisms; Suggestion 1.1.2 - Notify stakeholders and use business logic to determine how to remediate data that is not valid.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.2 - Monitor the planned arrival of recent data from the source systems (Required)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.2.1 - Monitor for the arrival or availability of new data, and notify if the expected duration between data arrival is too long.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.3 - Define and measure the schedules of recurring analytics jobs (Required)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.3.1 - Monitor the start time for recurring analytics processing jobs compared to the expected start time.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.4 - Define and measure the runtime durations of analytics jobs (Required)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.4.1 - Monitor the start and end times for analytics processing steps or the overall analytics job.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

questions.title: 2 - Modernize deployment of the analytics jobs and applications

choices.title: Best Practice 2.1 - Use version control for job and application changes (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.1.1 - Implement infrastructure as code and application logic version control systems.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.2 - Set up testing data and a staging environment (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.2.1 - Use a curated dataset to test application logic and performance improvements, such that code changes can be comparatively analyzed for the desired outcomes; Suggestion 2.2.2 - Use a random sample of recent data to validate application edge cases and regressions have not been introduced; Suggestion 2.2.3 - Establish separate staging environments to fully test changes before going live.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.3 - Test and validate analytics jobs and application deployments (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.3.1 - Automate the deployment and testing of changes to infrastructure and applications.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.4 - Roll back failed deployments and backfill the data (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.4.1 - Use infrastructure as code and version control systems so that a failed deployment can be rolled back to a previous good state.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.5 - Build standard operating procedures for deployment, test, rollback, and backfill tasks (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.5.1 - Document and use standard operating procedures for implementing changes in your analytics workload.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.6 - Automate the standard operating procedures (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.6.1 - Use automation to perform changes to underlying analytics infrastructure or application logic.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

questions.title: 3 - Build financial accountability models for data and workload usage

choices.title: Best Practice 3.1 - Measure and notify of the data storage and processing costs per user of the workload (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 3.1.1 - Use tagging or other attribution methods to identify data storage ownership.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 3.2 - Allow downstream systems to use their own resources for analytics jobs (byo infrastructure) (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 3.2.1 - Perform regular reviews of analytics operations to determine if the business will benefit from teams managing their own infrastructure; Suggestion 3.2.2 - Use infrastructure as code and governance tools, such as AWS Service Catalog, to allow teams to self-provision infrastructure within approved constraints.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 3.3 - Build a common, shared processing system and measure the cost per analytics job (byo query) (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 3.3.1 - Perform regular reviews of analytics operations to determine if the business will benefit from shared, centralized analytics infrastructure; Suggestion 3.3.2 - Implement a per-request tracking mechanism which allows utilization attribution to the different teams.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 3.4 - Build an internal billback model for analytics workload usage (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 3.4.1 - Implement a cost-visibility and internal billback method to aggregate the team’s utilization of analytics resources.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 3.5 - Restrict and record resource allocation permissions using AWS IAM (Recommended)

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 3.5.1 - Create a cost governance framework that uses specialized IAM roles, rather than individual IAM users, to provision costly infrastructure; Suggestion 3.5.2 - Use IAM logs to attribute users assuming these specialized IAM roles for cost attribution.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.
